title: ihamE sukam
sahitya:
ihamE sukham tarum SaNmukham enavE varumE para sukhamE




anupallavi



ahamE pughundanudinamumE nam ArtigaL tIrttaruLi anavaratamumE



caraNam



namanAm avanaiyum vellalAmE nArkkavi kunjaradAsan nAmE
gamanAshrama sankaTavem-bhavasAgarak-karai EralAmE manamE
